review: I had been to multiple child specialists and liver doctors in past. I was told about Dr. Vyom's expertise in liver disease by a regular patient of his. Unlike other hi-fi specialists, he was so humble, gentle and receptive. With a very reasonable fees and excellent post consultation telephonic clarifications, I wish every learned and competent doctor should be one like him

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very good explanation to the cause, remedy , advice,  My self Dr Amrit K Swain, Freelance Embryologist.

Doctor missed out my mentioning that my child has fever along with cough and cold and prescribed medicines with no paracetamol. Visted him again after 1 day and upon asking about the fever medicine which he skipped to prescribe, he ignored. Cash is the only mode of payment. No receipt is provided. Even after visiting in a gap of 1 day he charged full visiting fees of 600/- ****** *** ******** ******* ***** *** * **** ***** **** ** *** **********

The doctor did not have any digital payment mode like paytm,debit card, credit card and did not provide any bill, invoice for payment of Rs 10000 that I have paid, further overall behaviour was not good
Motivation and Positive Attitude are the two most important medicines any doctor can prescribe. Thanks for doing that perfectly.

I had visited many doctors in past for poor weight gain of my baby. Everyone else got multiple tests done but nobody thought of celiac disease, which only Dr. Vyom suspected and got confirmed with a single blood test.
He did the endoscopy and my child was on treatment within 7 days of first visit. Baby is improving with diet therapy and i am more than just satisfied. Cheerful nature, good clinical ambience, reasonable charges and 24x7 availability on phone --- truly a woth recommending doctor

**** ****** ** ***** ******* **** **** ********** ** ***** ***** *** *** ********. You visit him after a day, he will ask for fees again for the same problem. I have paid 5 times Rs. 700 for the sane problem.
